message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too far from an even split for my liking. How about we try something closer to the middle?
I see you want a more even split, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 58-42?
This back and forth is just wasting time. An even split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it or leave it.
